version_description: Searchability Updates
Bug Fixes

Fixed crashes occurring during login
Fixed News article title formatting errors
Restoring previously selected customer account upon PIN entry
Displaying app version number
Misc UI improvements
Misc bug fixes

Addressed bugs on Dashboard when changing tab views
Addressed bugs when app return from the background
Improved handling of weather requests

- Added ability to compare your usage with similar homes.
- Use your Touch ID to log in to your app.
- Use 3D Touch to quickly navigate to: Find Payment Location, Make a Payment or Outage Center.

- Enhancements for Home Profile viewing for OPower users
- Better Accuracy for distance to Payment Locations
- Privacy Policy updates
- General bug fixes

•Payment Scheduling update
•Login performance improvement
• Maintenance Updates

• This is a required update and all previous APS app versions will not work.
• We have installed a new Customer Care and Billing system making this update necessary.
• Enjoy speed improvements for login to your account and other services.

• Improvements made to the GUI for smaller iPhones.
• Detailed usage graphs scale better.
• Usage graphs include current billing range as an option.

New Look. New Experience.

Uploading latest code for Version 3.0.16 (5) to Apple store

Bug fixes
New Build for Jan Release

This update includes several performance enhancements, visual improvements, and content updates. Among these include:

•Usage screen will now default to the daily usage section
•Bill download and zoom issues have been corrected
•Average cost per day reflects correct value
•Display improvements to bill estimate thresholds, login, usage, and calendar screens
We made improvements and fixed some issues to make your APS experience even smoother
